en: Ephraim feedeth on wind, and followeth after the east wind: he continually multiplieth lies and desolation; and they make a covenant with Assyria, and oil is carried into Egypt.
hmr: Ephraim chun thli a ring a, Khaw sakthli chu a zui hlak a; Khêl thu le inṭhedarna thu a sukpung tiel tiel a, Assuria leh thu an thlung a, Aigupta tieng chun hriek a phur lût a.

en: Jehovah hath also a controversy with Judah, and will punish Jacob according to his ways; according to his doings will he recompense him.
hmr: LALPA chun Juda chunga khawm hêkna ding a nei bawk a, Jakob chu a um dân angzie peiin hrem a tih; A thilthaw angzie peia thungin.

en: In the womb he took his brother by the heel; and in his manhood he had power with God:
hmr: Sula khawm khan a unaupa chu a kekhawngah a hung man a, A hung puitling khan Pathien chu a thawh a,

en: yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed; he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him at Beth-el, and there he spake with us,
hmr: Anih, vântirko a thawh a, a hne tah, A ṭap a, ditsakna a ngên a, Bethel hmuna chun ama a hmu tah a, Chutaka chun a kuomah thu a hril a;

en: even Jehovah, the God of hosts; Jehovah is his memorial name.
hmr: LALPA ngei, Sipaihai Pathien chun; LALPA ti chu a hming a nih.

en: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep kindness and justice, and wait for thy God continually.
hmr: Chuongchun, nang chun i Pathien tieng ngha la, Lunginsietna le rorêlna hmang la; I Pathiena chun innghat rawp rawh.

en: He is a trafficker, the balances of deceit are in his hand: he loveth to oppress.
hmr: Sumdâwngtu a na, a kutah bûkna indik naw a um a, Hlêm ngawt a châk hlak a nih.

en: And Ephraim said, Surely I am become rich, I have found me wealth: in all my labors they shall find in me no iniquity that were sin.
hmr: Ephraim chun, “Ka hausa takzet el tah a, Kân sukmuk takmeu el ta a nih; Ka sinthaw po poahai hlak chun Keimaa thil suol an hmu ding hlak um dêr lo,” a tih a.

en: But I am Jehovah thy God from the land of Egypt; I will yet again make thee to dwell in tents, as in the days of the solemn feast.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei hi Aigupta rama inthawk ta khan, LALPA i Pathien chu ka na; Ruoiṭhe hun lai ang khan puon inah lân chêngtir nâwk ka ti che.

en: I have also spoken unto the prophets, and I have multiplied visions; and by the ministry of the prophets have I used similitudes.
hmr: Zâwlneihai kuoma khawm thu ka hril hlak a, Inlârnahai ka sukpung a; Zâwlneihai hmangin tekhina ka siem hlak;

en: Is Gilead iniquity? they are altogether false; in Gilgal they sacrifice bullocks; yea, their altars are as heaps in the furrows of the field.
hmr: Gilead chu rîtlona a ni naw am a nih? Teplo el an nih annâwm; Gilgala chun bâwngchal an inhlân hlak a. Anih, an mâichâmhai chu leilet changkuonga Lung dêng khâwm ang el an nih.

en: And Jacob fled into the field of Aram, and Israel served for a wife, and for a wife he kept sheep.
hmr: Jakob chu Aram rama chun a tlân hmang a, Israel chun nuhmei man a tuok tah a; Nuhmei man ding chun berâm a vêng a nih.

en: And by a prophet Jehovah brought Israel up out of Egypt, and by a prophet was he preserved.
hmr: Zâwlnei hmangin Israel chu Aiguptaa inthawkin LALPAIN a ṭhuoi suok a; Zâwlnei bawk hmang chun a hum bawk a.

en: Ephraim hath provoked to anger most bitterly: therefore shall his blood be left upon him, and his reproach shall his Lord return unto him.
hmr: Ephraim hlak chun a suklungsen nasa êm êm el a, Chuleiin, a thisen insuo chu ama chungah a tla a, A hrilsietna chu ama chungah LALPAIN intlâktir a tih.
